BASICS.__info__0: What is the name of your hackerspace?
BASICS.__info__1: The sentences in HACKERSPACE_IS_SENTENCES show up on the landingpage in the header.

english: is what you make of it

WIKI.__info__: When scraping your wiki for photos, photos appearing on the following pages will be ignored

CONSENSUS_ITEMS.__info__: If you use Discourse for creating & discussing consensus items (recommended), enter here the category URL.

WEBSITE.__info__0: What is your primary domain where you will host your website?
WEBSITE.__info__1: Where is your GIT repo hosted? So others can suggest changes to your code.
WEBSITE.__info__2: What languages should your website support? Currently available are: english & hebrew.

EVENTS.__info__0: Please enter your slug, not the full URL: https://www.meetup.com/{{ MEETUP_GROUP }}/
EVENTS.__info__1: Which additional meetup groups organize events at your hackerspace? https://www.meetup.com/{{ group_name }}/
EVENTS.__info__2: What is the default space/room for events in your hackerspace?
EVENTS.__info__3: Are there repeating events in your space which happen always in the same space/room? List them here as default values.
EVENTS.__info__4: Are there repeating events in your space with typically the same organizer? List the event names here as default values, together with the Discourse usernames of the organizers.
EVENTS.__info__5: Do you have guildes in your hackerspace? Groups which take care of different parts of the space? Add keywords and the name of the guilde here, to automatically connect them to new events.
EVENTS.__info__6: If someone wants to organize an event at your hackerspace and expects a LARGE CROWD_SIZE, they have to define who takes responsibility to stay at the door, to welcome people and make theft more difficult.

MEETINGS.__info__0: Do you use RiseUpPad? A pretty useful real time text editor for groups. Like Google Docs, but without Google and simpler. Enter your RiseUpPad meeting note path here, so we can automatically create new meeting notes for you and save them when you are done. https://pad.riseup.net/p/{{ PATH }}

PHYSICAL_SPACE.__info__0: How do you call people in your hackerspace? Hackers? Noisebutts?
PHYSICAL_SPACE.__info__1: When is your hackerspace open? (based on a 24 hour cycle) The status will be visible on your landingpage in the header.

SOCIAL.__info__0: What social media accounts do you have? Patreon? Facebook? Twitter? And more? Feel free to add them all - the most important ones first.
SOCIAL.__info__1: Where can we find images on Flickr about your hackerspace? We automatically save the photo URLs to your Photo database (not the actual photos).
SOCIAL.__info__2: Where can we find images Google Photos about your hackerspace? We automatically save the photo URLs to your Photo database (not the actual photos).
SOCIAL.__info__3: What hashtag do people use on Twitter and Instagram when they talk about your hackerspace? We automatically save the posts & photo URLs to your Photo database (not the actual photos).
SOCIAL.__info__4: How do you communicate online in your community? Via Discourse? Or Slack? Or someting else?
